articles.title: Heard immunity: No-vax Novak saying nothing - The Age
articles.description: Australia still treats COVID-19 as an emergency. This attracts criticism here and scorn around the world, but it’s saved thousands of lives. The world’s No.1 tennis player is likely to find that the Australian Open is shut to him.
